text: Yes, this a problem. httpd 2.0.x does not support large files. You need to upgrade to 2.2.x.

text:
(In reply to comment #7)

> 
> Also, is it possible to have 2.2.x apache in RHEL AS 3? (as per redhat, 
> that supports httpd-2.0.46-70.ent)

Sure. Just download the sources and compile it. Just keep in mind that RedHat will give no support for your self compiled httpd. You have to take care about this by yourself, just the way you are doing now here. Normally you would report any problems with the httpd delivered by RedHat to RedHat.
Doesn't appear to be an Apache bug, no updates in a year, closing it.
